newsitem.title: USA: Cache Sept same store sales up 3 pct.
newsitem.headline: Cache Sept same store sales up 3 pct.

text.p: Cache Inc said Thursday total sales for September were $11.8 million for the five week period ended September 28, 1996, which increased 9 percent from $10.9 million in fiscal 1995.
Same store sales increased 3 percent during the five week 1996 period, as compared to the same period in September 1995.

Total sales for the nine months ended September 28, 1996 were $90 million, as compared to $84 million for the same period in 1995, which represents an increase of $6 million or 7 percent. Same store sales for the nine month period in 1996 decreased 1 percent as compared to the same period in 1995.
